info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 12 at 12:21AM MST until November 12 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21 in Southeast New Mexico and as low as 25 in West Texas. * WHERE...Southeast New Mexico Plains, Gaines, Dawson, Andrews, and Martin. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
